dc:title: Day After Day - March 1935
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Thoughts on Molly Maguires, labor organizing, a visit to the Cathedral in Toronto, the activities of young Communists, and the work of Catherine de Hueck.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 286 1935-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
